Description: Papyrus bearing a Coptic epistolary text. 16 lines written along the fibres (recto) and two lines written against the fibres (verso).
Bibliographic references: Crum 1939 / Varia Coptica (no. 38, p. 19 and pl. 13)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (83773) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/83773)

Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.CrumVC 38 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
